summary: Completed comprehensive testing of V3 P1 features: Export APIs, Dashboard Refresh Interval, and Bulk Node Import. All 24 backend tests passed (100%). All frontend features working correctly.

bulk_node_import: GET /api/v3/import/nodes/template - returns template with headers and examples
POST /api/v3/import/nodes missing domain without create - reports error
authentication: All export endpoints require authentication (401/403 without token)

dashboard_refresh_interval: Refresh interval dropdown visible in header (shows 1m by default)
domains_page_export: Export dropdown button visible on Asset Domains page
Dropdown shows 'Export as CSV' and 'Export as JSON' options
network_detail_export_import: Export dropdown button visible on Network detail page
Export dropdown shows 'Export as CSV' and 'Export as JSON'
Import dialog opens with proper title 'Import Nodes (Path-Level SEO)'
CSV file input with 'Choose File' button
Shows optional columns: optimized_path, domain_role, target_domain, target_path
Import button shows count (Import 0 Nodes when no file selected)

1_export_v3_data.backend: All export endpoints return correct JSON/CSV format with enriched data
1_export_v3_data.frontend: Export dropdowns on Domains page and Network detail page working
details: Asset domains export includes brand_name, category_name, registrar_name
Network export includes full structure with entries and tier_distribution
Activity logs export with filters working

2_dashboard_refresh_interval.backend: GET/PUT settings/dashboard-refresh and GET dashboard/stats working
2_dashboard_refresh_interval.frontend: Dropdown selector in header with 5 options (Manual, 30s, 1m, 5m, 15m)
details: User preference stored in user_preferences collection
Stats endpoint returns lightweight data for auto-refresh

3_bulk_node_import_with_path.backend: POST /api/v3/import/nodes processes CSV data with path support
3_bulk_node_import_with_path.frontend: Import Nodes dialog with file upload and create_missing_domains toggle
details: Template includes: domain_name, optimized_path, target_domain, target_path
create_missing_domains option creates domains if not found

critical_code_review_comments: All P1 features implemented correctly per specification
Export endpoints properly enrich data with related entity names
Dashboard refresh uses lightweight stats-only endpoint for smooth refresh
Bulk import properly handles path-level nodes and target resolution
seed_data_creation: Bulk import test created test domains with unique suffixes
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 P1 features fully implemented and tested: 1) Export V3 Data to CSV/JSON works for asset-domains, networks (individual and all), and activity-logs. 2) Dashboard refresh interval selector works with 5 options and persists to user preferences. 3) Bulk node import with path support works with CSV file upload, create_missing_domains toggle, and target resolution.
